Name: King Midas
Equipment_Options: This model is equipped with The Golden Blade of Midas

Unit_Abilities.Ability_Effect: After this model has fought, each enemy Formation that lost 1 or more Health because of an attack from this model has their Attacks Characteristic reduced by 1 permanently to a minimum of 1. This ability does not stack with itself.

Once per battle at the end of the Movement Step this model can elect to turn an objective zone to gold. Once an objective zone has been turned gold the controller of King Midas is considered to control that objective and that objective cannot be razed by an enemy Formation.
